description: Episode of Series "Child development series". An analysis of social behaviour at different age levels and the reasons underlying the changes in behaviour patterns as the child develops. Stresses the point that while the child must meet and solve each problem as they reach that level of growth, guidance from understanding parents can make the adjustment easier and smoother.
